name: CVE-2018-8470
description: A security feature bypass vulnerability exists in Internet Explorer due to how scripts are handled that allows a universal cross-site scripting (UXSS) condition, aka "Internet Explorer Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability." This affects Internet Explorer 11.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:internet_explorer:11:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1607:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_8.1:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1703:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1709:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1803:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_8.1:-:*:*:*:rt:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server:2012:r2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server:2016:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server:2008:r2:sp1:*:*:*:x64:*'))]
